items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement an AI-based system to provide personalized product recommendations to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System generates at least 5 personalized product suggestions per user session
Recommendations update in real-time as user interacts with the platform
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing
Recommendations are displayed on homepage, product pages, and cart page
dependencies: User data collection and storage system
non_functional: System scales to handle 1 million concurrent users
Data privacy compliance with GDPR and CCPA

notes: Assumed the platform already has basic e-commerce functionality and user accounts. Requirement focuses on AI recommendation feature.
